name: Lucky Fighter
description:
Lucky Fighter is a luck based action game developed by a 15 year old.

controls-:

left movment -:   a

right movment -: d

jump -: space bar

attack -: left mouse button

Concept-:

THE CONCEPT OF GAME IS EASY YOU START THE GAME
WITH 100% LUCK AND A POWER METER ALONG WHICH A
POINTER CONSTANTLY MOVES. THE SPEED OF POINTER
IS DETERMINED BY YOUR LUCK , HIGHER THE LUCK, 
LOWER THE SPEED WHICH ENABLES YOU TO ACCURATELY
TO STOP THE POINTER AT GREEN AREA WHICH GIVES YOU
A SPECIFIC POWER WITH WHICH YOU NEED TO FIGHT 
DIFFERENT MONSTERS. THE DAMAGE RECEIVED IN BATTLES
DEDUCT A PERCENTAGE OF LUCK AND AGAIN TAKE YOU TO
POWER METER THIS CYCLE CONTINUES TILL YOU ARE 
DEFEATED. HIGHER LEVEL YOU GO THE STRONGER MONSTER B
BECOMES. LET"S SEE IF YOU CAN EVEN REACH LEVEL 10
MINIMUM LUCK AND POWER IS 10%.
